name: Cube runner (itch) (Gorilla Gang)
description:
You're a cube and you have to make it out alive 

The music will drive you crazy but I know you don't like easy games 

And as Devs we dare you to attempt the bonus level at the end . If you make it that far

Our first project so please be honest 

 support us by donating (^^)(^^) please and thank you :^)
